Tomato Sauce

Prep Time

~10min

Source

Several

Notes

  • Target: a relatively non-frills tom-sauce.

  • This is just the sauce, without meat.

  • It can then be used for lasagna, with some meat for a spagbol, etc…

Ingredients

  • Tomato passata (sieved tomatoes) cans

  • Celeri sticks

  • Carrots

  • Onions

  • Salt

  • Chicken Stock

  • Milk

  • Wine

  • Olive oil

Preparation

  1. Chop and mix: onions + celeri + carrots.

  2. Heat up olive oil in a pot and do an ‘affogato’, until the onions are translucent.

  3. Deglaze the veggies with the wine.

  4. Once the wine has evaporated, add tomato passata, then chicken stock and a glass of milk.

  5. Season with salt and pepper.

  6. Let it simmer for at least 2h.

  7. Taste check, if it’s too bitter, it’s ok to add some sugar.

  8. Once done, mix in fresh basil leaves.

  9. Once cooled down it’s ready to be stored in containers.
